text: Brickellia parryi is a Mexican species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to northeastern Mexico in the state of San Luis Potosí.Tropicos, Brickellia parryi A. Gray Gray, Asa. 1879. Proceedings of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences 15(1): 31 ==References== ==External links== *Photo of herbarium specimen at Missouri Botanical Garden, collected in San Luis Potosí, isotype of Brickellia parryi parryi Category:Flora of San Luis Potosí Category:Plants described in 1879
title: Brickellia parryi
